title: Shared Skies
description: What if?What if your hair grew to your waist every night?What if people did things simply because you thought of it? What if your grandparents disappeared eleven years ago, so completely that not even their house remained? What if they now want you to live with them, and no-one, except you, remembers they were ever gone? What if the first time you fell in love, you weren't even sure he was human? What if Parallel Worlds exist?
author: Josephine   O'Brien
